Content: Different weapons should use different ammunitions, which have to be
researched shipped and produced, making supply more complicated. There
could be supply bundles that supply according to their production costs
+10% to make it a little easier. The idea is more to ship planet
cracking rockets or a anti-station missle that can only be fired by two
ships around. Of course floating factories producing ammuntions and
other supplies (energy cells, food etc) would be way more interesting,
since they could be configured to serve the fleet they are assigned to.
